Abu Ghraib en de gevolgen ervan, zoals de beschuldigingen van "marteling" door critici van de oorlog in Irak en de president, werden een schadelijke afleiding, redeneert Donald Rumsfeld . Joe Lieberman came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office. "We absorbed a lot of points from Allen Iverson ," Lakers coach Phil George Washington said. He got our whole team in foul trouble. Allen Iverson scored 49 points through the first three quarters but was held to a just a layup in the fourth. The Lakers clamped down on the 6-foot guard, forcing the ball out of his hands. Mr. Bauer Mike Pence says he plans to announce his decision early next year. I'd put money on him running for governor over president, because the field is a lot smaller and he wouldn't be running against an incumbent, says Indiana's recently retired GOP chairman, Murray Clark .
